review: If I could give more than just 5 stars for this little wonder I would!  I've been using my FireTv box for about two months now and this little guy is well worth the money we paid for it.First off: I am not a gamer. You will not find any comment from me about gaming on this device.  Move on if you're a gamer.I wanted to have an alternative to cable TV when there's nothing on - which is often.  We have found an array of documentaries, movies, and TV shows that we love.  We also use our Netflix account with this device.I can say that the picture quality, and also sound quality are really quite good for such a small little box.  We use an HDMI connection and even non HD shows look good on our screen.  I really like the closed captioning feature on this as well.  I'm hard of hearing so I have to use it daily.  I can hear the shows with my hearing aids in but sometimes I miss a word or two.  The captioning feature is easy and clear to read and I feel is much better than the standard broadcast captioning.Well I have to run...my son is crying! I just wanted to give some highlights!
